product_name: The North Face Reversible Down Moondoggy Jacket - Girls'
long_description: The North Face Reversible Down Moondoggy jacket sports a cozy and versatile design that alters the look from a classic solid to a fun plaid print. Diamond-stitched nylon shell breathes well and securely holds the down insulation in place. 550-fill-power goose down insulation provides an unsurpassed warmth-to-weight ratio; down is the lightest, warmest and most compressible insulation available. Elasticized hood, cuffs and hem add protection from the elements. The North Face Reversible Down Moondoggy jacket features zippered hand pockets on the solid side and welted hand pockets on the plaid side.
short_description: The North Face Reversible Down Moondoggy jacket sports a cozy and versatile design that alters the look from a classic solid to a fun plaid print.
subcategory: Rainwear And Outerwear -- Boys And Girls
